Class GridModel<Integer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • GridModel<Integer>
  • Type Parameters:
    Integer - 

    public class GridModel<Integer>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is meant to a grid model of the order in which the cells are visited in a given completed or in-progress drag gesture.
    Author:
    Bill Xiang

      Constructs a Grid Model with the given 2-D integer grid
